question: Which state launches the Single Click Pension Delivery scheme?
explanation: Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan launched 'Single Click Pension Delivery' scheme. Under this scheme, the money will go directly into the account of the beneficiaries. On October 1, 2017, Mr. Chouhan also honoured the elderly who completed the age of 100 years with the "Shataayu" award.
